thread.title: BRIEF-Schlumberger Says Looking At Monetizing SPM Assets - Conf Call

title: BRIEF-Schlumberger Says Looking At Monetizing SPM Assets - Conf Call
text:
April 20, 2018 / 1:30 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Schlumberger Says Looking At Monetizing SPM Assets - Conf Call Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - Schlumberger NV: 
* SAYS HIGH END PRODUCTS AND SERVICES WILL BECOME ATTRACTIVE IN COMING QUARTERS - CONF CALL 
* SAYS INVESTMENT LEVEL IN INTERNATIONAL MARKET NOT SUFFICIENT - CONF CALL 
* SCHLUMBERGER SAYS LOOKING AT MONETIZING SOME ASSETS DURING THE TURN OF 2018 - CONF CALL 
* SCHLUMBERGER SAYS LOOKING AT MONETIZING SPM ASSETS DURING TURN OF 2018 - CONF CALL Further company coverage:
